decks.notes: The primary focus of this deck is to quickly fill the graveyard with spells in order to bring back Arclight Phoenix from exile. It utilizes cheap spells like Lightning Axe and Fiery Impulse to trigger the Phoenix's ability, while also including card draw with Consider and Treasure Cruise. Led by aggressive creatures like Picklock Prankster and Brazen Borrower, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of fast creatures and disruptive spells. With efficient card draw and removal, it seeks to outpace and outmaneuver the opponent in the early turns of the game.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on a fast and aggressive playstyle, aiming to quickly overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures and disruptive spells. The deck includes a mix of efficient removal spells like Fatal Push and Go for the Throat, along with disruptive cards like Thoughtseize and Duress to control the game. Sorin, Imperious Bloodlord provides additional support for your creatures, while Vein Ripper and Bloodtithe Harvester deliver consistent damage. Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Kroxa, Titan of Death's Hunger offer powerful late-game threats to seal the victory.

This deck focuses on utilizing fast, low-cost creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Burning-Tree Emissary to quickly apply pressure to the opponent. Cards like Atarka's Command and Monstrous Rage help pump up these creatures for additional damage. Den of the Bugbear and Ramunap Ruins provide additional reach, while Play with Fire and Bonecrusher Giant serve as removal options. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a steady stream of aggressive creatures and burn spells, aiming to finish the game quickly before the opponent can stabilize.

This UW Control deck focuses on controlling the board with counterspells, removal, and card advantage, while also utilizing some creature removals and land manipulation. The deck includes powerful cards such as Teferi, Hero of Dominaria, Narset, Parter of Veils, and Dig Through Time to help control the game and outvalue the opponent. The sideboard is unique with Kaheera, the Orphanguard as a companion to further enhance the deck's control capabilities. The deck aims to outlast opponents and win through incremental advantages and efficient plays.

This deck revolves around utilizing Fires of Invention to play multiple high-cost spells for free each turn, allowing for efficient control of the board. The key strategy involves setting up Enigmatic Incarnation to continually search for powerful creatures to pressure the opponent while maintaining control with removal spells like Chained to the Rocks and Leyline Binding. With a mix of control elements, card advantage, and powerful threats, the deck aims to outvalue the opponent and control the game until it can overwhelm the opponent with its powerful creatures.

The deck focuses on using ramp and control elements to quickly build up mana and control the board. With cards like Sylvan Caryatid and Arboreal Grazer to ramp up mana, the deck aims to cast powerful spells such as Storm the Festival and Kitnap to maintain board control and overwhelm the opponent. Fae of Wishes provides versatile options for additional control or threats as needed. The deck also includes some protection spells like Fading Hope to deal with threats from the opponent. Overall, the strategy revolves around ramping quickly and controlling the game to secure victory.
